name: Jude Crener Junior Pierre
biography: I am a PhD candidate at Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP), a subfield of Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL). My research focuses on applying NLP techniques to medical data, aiming to retrieve meaningful insights and solve societal problems.

education.institution: Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST)

education.degree: BSc in Computer Science and Economics

experience.description: Conducting research on Medical Informatics (NAIST Social Computing Laboratory)

experience.company: Schneider Electric, HMI Activity, R&D, C&S Team (Osaka, Japan)
experience.description: Implementing using C/C++ a new communication protocol using MQTT to allow industrial Human Machine Interface (HMI) to send and receive data from the cloud.
Minimizing financial risks in the company, conduct financial reconciliations, financial data analysis
Developping web apps for clients using Backend and Frontend technologies

skills: Web Development (Node.js, flask,  React.js, CSS, HTML)
